      • findLevel

        public Level findLevel(String name)
        Find a level with the given name. If part of a name is given, then it will try to find the full name
        Specified by:
        findLevel in interface LevelHandler
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the level
        Returns:
        The level found. If more than 1 level is found, then it will return null

      • loadClassicLevel

        public ClassicLevel loadClassicLevel(String filename)
        Load a level and have it return the loaded level
        Parameters:
        filename - The .ggs file to load. If a .dat file is presented, then it will be converted to a .ggs
        Returns:
        The loaded level.

      • unloadLevel

        public boolean unloadLevel(Level level)
        Unload a level This method will call Level#Unload(Server, boolean) with save as true.
        Specified by:
        unloadLevel in interface LevelHandler
        Parameters:
        level - The level will unload
        Returns:
        boolean Returns true if the level was unloaded, otherwise returns false.

      • unloadLevel

        public boolean unloadLevel(Level level,
                  boolean save)
        Unload a level
        Parameters:
        level - The level to unload
        save - Whether the level should save before unloading
        Returns:
        boolean Returns true if the level was unloaded, otherwise returns false.
